author: aadamchik
msg: changed POM version of the release tag

author: fdmanana
msg: Don't close an idle system DB to open a non-system DB. Doing so allowed us to open more than max_open_dbs non-system DBs.
This issue is revealed when there are more than 1 system DBs (_users and _replicator).

author: fapeeler
msg: removed call to set vmhostid to null
